document_data.name: Brackleberry jam
document_data.mainbody: '''Brackleberry''' was the term [[Cormyrean]]s used to describe any jam made with mixed berries from the wilderness.
document_data.Description:
The base for these jams was typically a mixture of [[gooseberry|gooseberries]], [[strawberry|strawberries]], [[raspberry|raspberries]], or [[currant]]s. These berries were leavened with overripe peaches or quinces and packed in sugar.

Brackleberry jams were imported into [[Cormyr]] from warmer countries such as [[Chessenta]].
